name: Save the world
description:
The story is a common young man summoned to another world which is suffered immensely from the scourge of aggression by unknown monsters,and save the world with the native heroes.

The main game mode is rogue,you need to build a right team,and release your kill desire to kill the monsters all!!!

Special

Wu Xing Ba Gua System

,allow you active powerful

Zhen Fa

to bomb the monsters!

Guarantee your surprise!

The monster have "Gold,Wood,Earth,Water,Fire" element attribute,and have race attribute.You have to depend on the enemies feature,choose heroes and formations subtly to restraint,or will die with monsters besiege.

Every hero has special attack mode and final upgrade to suit environment of different battle field.

And heros have element attribute,different element heroes can make up formation by standing special positions.Active powerful formation weapon make you kill monsters in wide area.

Apart from this,the game has deep playable interior system,make you taste intrigue when disaster comes.

The produce system,make you lead your people to constrct your manor.You can build proper buildings and proper roadlines,lead your people produce much military resources to support frontline.

Strategy system,make you to be a commander.You can command your troops attack your enemies from multi direction at same time.Taste kill all enemies at a laugh:)

●migratory planet system allow you build planet enegine after you unify the planet.remold your planet to a space ship in order to escape threat from powerful
alien enemies in the university.begin epic migratory planet plan for looking for new home for your peaple.
